text:
Dependent on the hair length and the styling, curls can look sensuous, romantic, sassy or wild.

Did Mother Nature fail to give you curls? No problem! Simply create them using curlers, foam curlers or a curling iron. Our styling instructions explain how to style beautiful curls using everybody's favorite styling aid, the curling iron.
title: How To Curl Hair: Ultimate Guide

meta_data.description: Want to learn how to make your hair curly? Read over these top tips and tricks from Schwarzkopf for effortless and easy curls.
